metadata.name: Karma
metadata.description:
I was happy being back home after being away for 5 years due to the war

I was starting to rebuild my community, relationships with clients and establishing my studio in Damascus

While I was waiting for my desk to be done ... I used to take my drawing kit and sit in the same cafe for weeks, enjoying the music, great coffee, conversations with friends and drawing.

That cafe was called Karma
______________

From a physical piece - available -
ink on paper | Damascus | 2017
